name: The Oneironaut (ppocketss)
description:
This is the last (planned) build of my project that I've been working on since college. It's essentially just a mostly empty movement demo, to play around with the movement mechanics and abilities. Just wanted to share what I have before I put it on hiatus to experiment with smaller ideas. Made public bc I got over that insecurity lol. Thanks for looking!

Maybe follow me on twitter? @ppocketss ❤
